content: finished measurements bust 48 52 56 60 64 68 72 / 122 132 142 152 5 162 5 172 5 183 cm length 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 / 40 5 43 45 5 48 5 51 53 5 56 cm **note ** top is designed to be very oversized at bust with about 14 of ease it is designed to be cropped length gauge in pattern 16 sts and 9 row = 4 1/2 /11 5cm after blocking note 3 pattern repeats = about 7 /18cm one pattern repeat consists of 3 double_crochet and the chain-sps and sts worked before the next 3 double_crochet
